questions.question: You are a data scientist troubleshooting a model re-training job for a neural network. Model performance on specific tasks has decreased and you have identified the issue as catastrophic forgetting. Which changes might you consider?
options: Use a rehearsal strategy in your training job and include older samples in your training set.
Make your data less complex by removing the number of features used in the training job.
Decrease the number of layers in the neural network.
Use data augmentation to remove the older samples from the training set.
correct_answers: Use a rehearsal strategy in your training job and include older samples in your training set.
